entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy with a few showers changing to 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
